xxl.core.util
Interface Distance<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type of the objects whose distance can be determined by this class.
All Known Implementing Classes:
LpMetric
public interface Distance<T>

An interface for determining the distance between two objects (see also Comparable <--> Comparator).

See Also:
DistanceTo

Field Summary
static Function<Object,Distance> EUCLIDEAN
          A kind of factory method that returns a new distance function according to the L_2 metric ("euclidean" metric).
static Function<Object,Distance> LEVENSHTEIN
          A kind of factory method that returns a new distance function according to the Levenshtein distance.
static Function<Object,Distance> MANHATTEN
          A kind of factory method that returns a new distance function according to the L_1 metric ("manhatten" metric).
 
Method Summary
 double distance(T object1, T object2)
          Computes the distance between the given objects.
 

Field Detail

MANHATTEN

static final Function<Object,Distance> MANHATTEN
A kind of factory method that returns a new distance function according to the L_1 metric ("manhatten" metric).

EUCLIDEAN

static final Function<Object,Distance> EUCLIDEAN
A kind of factory method that returns a new distance function according to the L_2 metric ("euclidean" metric).

LEVENSHTEIN

static final Function<Object,Distance> LEVENSHTEIN
A kind of factory method that returns a new distance function according to the Levenshtein distance.

Method Detail

distance

double distance(T object1,
                T object2)
Computes the distance between the given objects.

Parameters:
object1 - first object
object2 - second object
Returns:
returns the distance between given objects
